TCR Clustering Benchmarking CodeÔÉÅ

This website provides the original code used to conduct simulations and real data analyses for benchmarking T Cell Receptor (TCR) Clustering tools.

Data Process:

  • Database
    • IEDB datasets
    • McPAS dataset (cancer VS. non-cancer)
    • VDJdb dataset (Human influenza, SARS-cov-2, CMV, and mouse)
  • Real data
    • 10x nsclc
    • Su covid-19
    • Zheng pancancer
    • ctcl
    • Breast
    • Longitudianl melanoma

Tool application:

  • GIANA and ClusTCR
  • GLIPH2
  • TCRex
  • TCRbase
  • TCR-BERT
  • TCRMatch
  • pMTnet
  • SETE
  • NetTCR2.0
  • tcrdist3

Results process:

  • simulation results process
    • Set up the code before we process the result from each tool
    • GIANA
    • iSMART
    • clustTCR
    • TCRex
    • GLIPH2
    • TCR-BERT
    • pMTnet
    • SETE
    • NetTCR2.0
    • tcrdist3
    • TCRmatch
    • Create the plot
